ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mvlraddi.1 | |- A e. CC |
| 2 |  | mvlraddi.2 | |- B e. CC |
| 3 |  | mvlraddi.3 | |- ( A + B ) = C |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_pncan3oi | |- ( ( A + B ) - B ) = A |
| 5 | 3 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( ( A + B ) - B ) = ( C - B ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_eqtr3i | |- A = ( C - B ) |
